content: used abbreviations in this and other body kelbourne woolens patterns visit work rnds 1 8 of seersucker stitch from chart or written kelbournewoolens com/abbreviations instructions 5 times ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 2 march hat meghan babin crown seersucker chart round 1 decrease *ssk k1 p1 repeat from * around 81 90 sts round 2 decrease *ssk p1 repeat from * around 54 60 sts 8 round 3 decrease *ssk repeat from * around 27 30 sts 7 6 5 size 18 only 4 round 4 decrease *ssk repeat from * to 1 st rem k1 14 sts 3 round 5 decrease *ssk repeat from * to 1 st rem k1 7 sts 2 1 size 20 only pattern round 4 decrease *ssk repeat from * around 15 sts repeat round 5 decrease *ssk repeat from * to 1 st rem k1 8 sts finishing chart key break yarn thread through live stitches 2 3 times and fasten_off remove waste yarn from provisionally co edge knit weave in remaining ends soak in cool water and wool wash and block to measurements purl pom pom make a 4 diameter pompom with remaining yarn secure pom pom to hat and tie off inside label using sewing thread and a sharp sewing needle sew-on kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown year of hats useful tips 12 designs from for a tutorial on working from charts visit kelbourne woolens kelbournewoolens com/tips-and-tricks/ working-from-charts ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #kwyearofhats ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved images © linette kielinski v 1 3 15 19 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 4
